components.name: Web GUI
components.description: User interface for managing applications and databases, allowing users to deploy and configure services easily.

components.name: API Server
components.description: Handles requests from the Web GUI and CLI, processes application logic, and interacts with the datastore and Docker services.

components.name: Data Store
components.description: Persistent storage for application configurations, user data, and service states, ensuring data integrity and availability.

components.name: Docker Engine
components.description: Containerization platform that runs applications in isolated environments, managed by CapRover for deployment and scaling.

components.name: Nginx Load Balancer
components.description: Acts as a reverse proxy and load balancer for incoming traffic to the deployed applications, providing SSL termination and routing.

data_flows.description: User actions in the Web GUI trigger API calls to the API Server for application management.
The API Server retrieves and stores application configurations and states in the Data Store.
The API Server sends commands to the Docker Engine to deploy, start, or stop containers.
Nginx routes incoming traffic to the appropriate Docker containers based on the configuration.

trust_boundaries.name: User Interaction Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between the user interface and the backend services, where user input is validated and processed.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between the application logic and the data storage, ensuring data integrity and security.
